<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The call to createScalarMASSCall() invalidates the iterator over users</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// upon replacing the users. Precomputing the current list of users allows</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
